name: A Wheel Without a View
description:
languages: english / 日本語

-

ONLY ONE RIDE PER DAY.

OPEN UNTIL OTHERWISE.

-

This is a ticket for A Wheel Without a View. You may use the ticket as many times as you want as long as the wheel is still in operation, but the ticket can only be used once per day.

For more information, please contact the operator.

-

The ticket itself is a complimentary gift to you, but with a donation of $3 or higher, you will receive a set of complimentary photos (moving & stationary) depicting the wheel at various times of day.

-

Game by npckc.
Music by sdhizumi.

-

Originally made for Indiepocalypse #14.
